backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor implementing an e-commerce backend with user profiles, products, categories, cart, wishlist, orders, coupons, referrals, Stripe integration, role-based access control, and blob storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report JSON file with no features listed.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend source files including React components, hooks, pages, routing, internationalization, theme management, and query client configuration.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark themes, including color tokens for UI components and charts.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with meta tags, theme color, and script tag loading the React application from main.tsx.
frontend/public/offline.html: Empty offline fallback HTML file (no content).
frontend/public/sw.js: Empty service worker JavaScript file (no content).
frontend/README.md: Frontend documentation describing features, application routes (public, user, admin, payment), tech stack, and local development setup instructions.
frontend/scripts/clean-build.sh: Bash script that performs a clean build by removing caches, reinstalling dependencies, running TypeScript checks, building the app, and displaying a post-deployment validation checklist.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React application component configuring TanStack Router with all routes (public, user, admin), ThemeProvider, TranslationProvider, Toaster, RootErrorBoundary, and service worker cleanup on mount.
frontend/src/components/admin/CategoryEd: Dialog component for adding or editing product categories with name and image upload (file or data URL), includes validation, error handling, and retry logic for failed operations.
frontend/src/components/admin/ProductEdi: Dialog component for adding or editing products with fields for name, description, price, stock, category selection, and image upload, includes validation, error handling, and retry functionality.
frontend/src/components/admin/StripePaym: Admin configuration page for setting up Stripe payment integration by entering secret key and allowed country codes, displays current configuration status.
frontend/src/components/category/Categor: Reusable image component for displaying category images with fallback to placeholder on error or missing URL, supports both remote URLs and data URLs.
frontend/src/components/errors/AppErrorF: Error fallback UI component displaying a user-friendly error message with a refresh button when the application encounters an unexpected error.
frontend/src/components/errors/RootError: React error boundary class component that catches unhandled errors in the component tree and displays the AppErrorFallback component.
frontend/src/components/home/BannerCarou: Carousel component displaying rotating home page banner images with navigation controls using shadcn/ui carousel component.
frontend/src/components/home/CategoriesG: Grid display of product categories with loading skeletons, error handling with retry, and navigation to catalog filtered by category on click.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Main application layout component providing the structure with header, main content outlet, and footer for all pages.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Application footer with company info, quick navigation links, social media icons, copyright notice, and caffeine.ai attribution with UTM tracking.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Main navigation header component with logo, search, cart, wishlist, user authentication, theme toggle, and language selector. Includes responsive mobile menu and enforces BISAULI branding.
frontend/src/components/LoadingSkeletons: Reusable skeleton loading components for product cards, product grids, category cards, and order rows using shadcn/ui Skeleton primitives.
frontend/src/components/product/ProductC: Product card component displaying product image, name, price, stock status, and add-to-cart button. Links to product detail page and handles authentication checks.
frontend/src/components/product/ProductI: Reusable product image component with fallback placeholder handling for missing or invalid image URLs, supporting both remote URLs and Data URLs.
frontend/src/components/pwa/A2HSInstallP: Empty file for Add-to-Home-Screen PWA install prompt component.
frontend/src/components/pwa/OfflineBanne: Empty file for offline status banner component.
frontend/src/components/vendor/VendorDas: Empty file for vendor dashboard component.
frontend/src/components/vendor/VendorLog: Empty file for vendor login form component.
frontend/src/components/vendor/VendorPro: Empty file for vendor product editor dialog component.
frontend/src/hooks/mutations/usePlaceOrd: React Query mutation hook for placing orders with shipping address, invalidating cart/orders/dashboard/products queries on success and handling backend unavailability errors.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/queryClientKe: Centralized query key definitions for React Query, separating public/shopper keys from admin-scoped keys for products, categories, cart, orders, coupons, and settings.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useAdminCatal: Admin-scoped React Query hooks for managing products and categories (CRUD operations) using the admin actor, with query invalidation and error formatting.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useAdminHealt: Admin-scoped health check hook using anonymous admin actor to verify backend canister availability, with periodic refetching and status reporting.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useAdminOrder: React Query hooks for fetching all orders and updating order status using public actor, invalidating related queries on success.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useAuthz.ts: Authorization hooks for fetching caller user role and checking admin status using authenticated actor.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useCartWishli: React Query hooks for cart and wishlist operations (get, add, increment, decrement, remove) with authentication checks and backend unavailability error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useCatalog.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching products and categories from the public actor with timeout handling, error formatting, and caching strategies.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useCoupons.ts: Exports a React Query hook to fetch all coupons using the authenticated actor.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useDashboardS: Provides a React Query hook to fetch dashboard statistics (total orders and revenue) using the admin actor with timeout and error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useOrders.ts: Exports React Query hooks for fetching customer orders and individual order details with polling intervals.
Provides a React Query hook to fetch user referrals using the authenticated actor and Internet Identity.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useSiteSettin: Exports hooks for fetching and updating site settings, enforcing 'BISAULI' as the shop name with caching and refetch strategies.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useStripe.ts: Provides React Query hooks to check Stripe configuration status and a mutation hook to set Stripe configuration via admin actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous actor based on Internet Identity state, invalidating dependent queries on actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminActor.ts: Wraps useActor to provide an admin-specific actor hook that requires Internet Identity authentication and admin role.
frontend/src/hooks/useDocumentTitle.ts: Custom hook to dynamically update the document title, defaulting to 'BISAULI' if no title is provided.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state, identity persistence, and delegation validity.
frontend/src/hooks/usePublicActor.ts: Creates and manages an anonymous public actor for read-only catalog access without requiring authentication.
frontend/src/hooks/useTheme.ts: Wraps next-themes to provide theme state and setter with a typed interface and isDark helper.
frontend/src/i18n/index.tsx: Implements internationalization context and translations for English and Hindi languages with keys for navigation, products, cart, checkout, orders, profile, admin, and common UI elements.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables defining a warm color palette for light and dark modes, including colors for backgrounds, cards, buttons, charts, and sidebar components.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClient for data fetching and InternetIdentityProvider for authentication, then renders the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminCategories: Admin page for managing product categories with CRUD operations. Includes backend availability detection, error handling with retry functionality, and delete confirmation dialog.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminCouponsPag: Admin page displaying coupon management interface with basic loading state and coupon count display.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Admin dashboard showing statistics and product data with refresh functionality. Handles loading states, errors, and displays authorization-related error messages.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminLayoutPage: Admin panel layout with sidebar navigation, backend health check indicator, and session clearing functionality. Provides navigation to all admin sections with active route highlighting.
Admin authentication page using Internet Identity with role verification. Handles login flow, error states, and redirects authenticated admins to dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminOrdersPage: Admin page for viewing and managing all orders with status updates, sorting by timestamp, and error handling with retry functionality.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminProductsPa: Admin page for managing products with search, sorting, CRUD operations (add, edit, delete), and a confirmation dialog for deletions.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminSiteSettin: Admin page for updating site branding settings, specifically the shop logo with image upload, preview, and validation (file type and size).
Placeholder admin page for user management functionality that displays a "coming soon" message.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Shopping cart page displaying cart items with quantity controls (increment/decrement), product details, subtotal calculation, and checkout navigation. Requires user authentication and handles empty cart states.
frontend/src/pages/CatalogPage.tsx: Product catalog page with filtering by category, price range, search text, and sorting by price. Syncs filters with URL parameters and displays products in a grid with loading and error states.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Checkout page with shipping address form validation (name, phone, address, pincode), order summary display, and order placement functionality. Requires authentication and validates Indian phone/pincode formats.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home page displaying a banner carousel, featured products grid (first 8 products), and categories grid with loading skeletons and error handling with retry functionality.
frontend/src/pages/OrderConfirmationPage: Order confirmation success page displaying order ID with navigation options to view orders or continue shopping.
frontend/src/pages/orders/MyOrdersPage.t: Customer-facing page displaying all orders for the logged-in user with order summaries, status badges, and navigation to order details.
frontend/src/pages/orders/OrderDetailsPa: Displays detailed information for a specific order including status, date, total amount, and line items.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentFailurePage.ts: Payment failure page with error message and options to retry payment or return home.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentSuccessPage.ts: Payment success page with confirmation message and navigation to orders or home page.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetailsPage.ts: Displays detailed product information including image, price, description, and stock status. Allows authenticated users to add products to cart or wishlist with toast notifications.
frontend/src/pages/profile/AddressesPage: Placeholder profile page for address management that displays a "coming soon" message.
frontend/src/pages/profile/ProfileLayout: Layout wrapper for profile pages with tab navigation (overview, addresses, settings) and authentication check.
User settings page for toggling dark mode theme and selecting language (English/Hindi).
frontend/src/pages/vendor/VendorPage.tsx: Empty vendor page file with no implementation.
frontend/src/pages/WishlistPage.tsx: Shows user's wishlist with product cards, requiring authentication. Displays empty state or loading skeleton when appropriate.
frontend/src/utils/adminSessionReset.ts: Utility function to clear all admin session data by removing localStorage, sessionStorage, and expiring accessible cookies.
frontend/src/utils/backendAvailabilityEr: Provides utility functions to detect and handle backend canister unavailability errors (IC0508, network issues, deployment problems) and format user-friendly error messages.
frontend/src/utils/orderStatus.ts: Shared utilities for order status presentation including label mapping, badge color variants, and available status options for admin dropdowns.
frontend/src/utils/serviceWorker.ts: Utility function to unregister all service workers to prevent PWA behavior from affecting page performance.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for parsing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence support for maintaining state across navigation.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom color scheme using OKLCH, extended theme settings, container queries, typography plugin, and custom animations.
project_state.json: Project state tracking file for BISAULI project with pending feature requests to update admin login credentials to Username: Prashant, Password: Prashant80061.
